content:
**Which graph shows a linear function with range $-5<f(x) \leq 9$?**


[[â˜ƒ radio 1]]

options.alt: A coordinate plane. The x- and y-axes each scale by two. A graph of a line intersects the points (negative 3, 2) and (1, negative 1).

choices.content: ![A segment of a linear function is graphed. The x and f of x axes go from negative 10 to 10. There is a filled circle at the point (2, 9). There is an open, unfilled circle at the point (9, negative 5). There is a line segment connecting these two points.](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/038734bbbae76d13767f95f7b507f82433a6f20c)

![A segment of a linear function is graphed. The x and f of x axes go from negative 10 to 10. There is an open, unfilled circle at the point (2, 9). There is a filled circle at the point (9, negative 5). There is a line segment connecting these two points.](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/9df397bbb70b8eec0f7740d3cd227566a57c99a2)

![A segment of a linear function is graphed. The x and f of x axes go from negative 10 to 10. There is an open, unfilled circle at the point (negative 5, 8). There is a filled circle at the point (9, negative 6). There is a line segment connecting these two points.](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/5904ddfbe28288bb34685f057fff916689e2a24e)

![A segment of a linear function is graphed. The x and f of x axes go from negative 10 to 10. There is a filled circle at the point (negative 5, 8). There is an open, unfilled circle at the point (9, negative 6). There is a line segment connecting these two points.](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/9a750d2bf9e421d094a0382576f6b77005e48007)
